title: Mark A. Aguiar
snippet: Mark A. Aguiar is the Walker Professor of Economics and International Finance at Princeton University. His research focuses on models of consumption and savings with applications in both open- and closed-economy macroeconomics.

title: Mark Aguiar - Mark Aguiar
snippet: Director, International Economics Section, Princeton University (2021-present) ... TIAA-CREF Paul A. Samuelson Award 2006 · Sloan Foundation Doctoral Dissertation Fellowship, 1998-1999. Research Fellowship, International Finance Division, Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, 1998 ...

title: Mark A. Aguiar
snippet: Mark A. Aguiar is the Walker Professor of Economics and International Finance in the Department of Economics at Princeton University. Aguiar co-directs the Griswold Center for Economic Policy Studies (GCEPS).

title: Mark A. Aguiar - Princeton University
snippet: Aguiar, M., Jun 2024, In: Finance and Development.
